body_html:
They compile, I just had to create build_all.bat

The problem (as I stated above) is that sizeof(long)==4.

For example,
#include <stdio.h>
#include "TH/THStorage.h"

int main () {
auto sdf = (THLongStorage*) NULL;
printf ("%d\n", sizeof(sdf->data[0]));
}
Compiled with Visual Studio 15, targeting x64, this prints out 4.
